item.title: Track Core Web Vitals In GA4 With Google Tag Manager
item.description: Updated 26 May 2021: Added details about the new Namespace Objects option in the template. Core Web Vitals is described on the dedicated web.dev resource as (emphasis mine): “Core Web Vitals are the subset of Web Vitals that apply to all pages, should be measured by all site owners, and will be surfaced across all Google tools.” The Core Web Vitals measurement as suggested by Google are:
